recipe:
MM Veggie Soup
2 lamb shanks or other lamb bones 1 swede chopped 1 turnip chopped 1 parsnip chopped 2 celery sticks chopped 2 large carrots chopped 250 gms McKenzies soup mix 1 bay leaf Stock to cover SandP to taste
Place all ingredients in a large pot and cover with stock until it is up to your thumb joint over all ingredients. Bring to the boil, then reduce to a simmer. Remove scum from the top and cook until the meat is falling of the bone (about 4-6 hours.) Remove shanks and shred meat with knife and fork. Place all back into the pot, including the bones. Cook until soup thickens, usually another 1-2 hours. Remove bones and season with SandP. Serve with crusty bread. You can freeze the soup or cook in slow cooker on low for 8-10 hours.
This one of my families favourites. Good to cook on a day you intent spending at home! MM- my mums
